page.title: 10Leisure activities.Wishford.
page.content: Most people visit local areas of interest of which there are many. The visits usually take the form of family outings at the weekends mostly. Some team games are played but recreational facilities are few. Most people take advantage of the countryside and the view around them and pastimes such as walking, fishing and gardening are very popular. Many village interests still carry on. People visit their friends frequently and together they go to local functions. Bell ringing is still popular in the village. Villagers organise fund raising activities in their spare time and sell things they have made. The older generation, through the Mothers' Union, often meet and organise outings.
